casebody.data:
No. 1367, No. 1386,

Misc.

Misc.

Horton v. New York; and Alvarez v. New York. Rolon W. Reed and Leon B. Polsky for petitioner in No. 1367, Misc. Patrick M. Wall for petitioner in No. 1386, Misc. Frank S. Hogan for respondent in both cases.

Ct. App. N. Y. Certiorari denied.

Reported below: 18 N. Y. 2d 355, 221 N. E. 2d 909; 19 N. Y. 2d 600, 224 N. E. 2d 884.
